law.catch_line: Executive Committee For Educational Television; Powers And Duties

text.section: Acquire, construct, hold, lease and dispose of real and personal property;

Prepare programs, enter into agreements providing for the furnishing of programs, and the disposition thereof within and without the commonwealth, equipment, assistance and personnel; purchase broadcast time; and enter into other contracts;
Obtain assistance from, and co-operate with others, including, without restriction, institutions of learning and groups interested in television broadcasting;
Hold and administer real and personal property, and money given, whether outright or in trust; and
Do all acts and things necessary or convenient to carry out the purposes for which the committee is created.
